examples.example: 在这方圆一里的范围内，充满了和谐与欢乐的氛围。

translate.english: Within the range of one li around here, it is filled with an atmosphere of harmony and joy.

examples.example: 我一口气跑完了一里路，感觉自己充满了活力。

translate.english: I ran one li all at one breath and felt full of vitality myself.

examples.example: 我每天都会沿着家附近的一里小路散步，欣赏沿途的风景。

translate.english: I walk along the one-mile path near my home every day and enjoy the scenery along the way.
